data.message: My underground freaked out since I love technology and philosophy at the same time, then turned to heroin for solace; it ain't my fault (I was going sober and they tried to convert me into being a Vampire, repeatedly).  These posts are posted backwards, so think backwards and you'll understand your status comments Eminem.  I'm not a racist.

replies.message: I didn't hold a gun to their head to smoke the heroin.  They couldn't handle it I wasn't going to be one of them with a terrible opiate addiction.
